title: Free font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203231635im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_5149.gif)
  
Probably a free font. But if it’s similar to anything higher-quality and available for purchase, please inform.
 [‹ bjorn torske ID?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203231635/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41143 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Bounty Trilogy open modern serif - Bodoni Open {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203231635/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36934 "Go to next forum topic")
author: koleslaw

comments.content:
Your sample is Graham Meade’s [Hiptop (or Hightop, it’s ambiguous)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203231635/http:/www.dafont.com/gm-hiptop.font?a=1%3E%3Cimg). Graham has made many fonts for free distribution over the years. He also now sells some of his designs under his latest foundry name: [Typotheticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203231635/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/typotheticals/). This doesn’t seem to be in that collection.

- Mike Yanega
